text: The Save the Children charity desperately needs your help, would you consider donating to this cause?
I'm sorry I do not know anything about the charity

They provide services to vulnerable children around the world.  Clean water, vaccines, etc... would you donate .15 cents? It is a small amount but added to other worker's donations it will go far in saving lives.
Is there any link or page I can visit to get more information on the charity? I am currently donating already to another charity and I am extremely picky on who I donate to.
Yes, Save the Children.org  The researchers will deduct any amount you would like to donate from your pay and make the payment for you.
Alright, to whom does the money go to

Save the Children.Your donation is really appreciated.  Recently for instance, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.
Does the charity only service children outside of the US?
No they also help children in the U.S. For instance they help children affected by natural disasters in the U.S.
Is the charity a non profit group?
Yes they are a non-profit
What are your annual goals, needs, and results?

In fiscal year 2017, 86% of all expenditures went to program services, 5% went to management, and 9% went to fundraising.  The goal is the more money raised the more services can be provided to children going through different disasters and crisis.
Who are your main competitors and how do your results in recent years compare to theirs?

In 2017 Save the Children helped 155 million children.  I don't know the statistics for other organizations.  The nice thing about this organization is the high percentage of money that goes directly to helping children and not overhead management costs.
Alright I have made a decision on how much to donate. I think overall the donation would not go to waste even if it is such a small amount.
Thank you very much it will make an impact.
I would like to donate $2.00 to the charity.
That's wonderful, Thanks again :)
Its no problem. I did my own research on the charity, and I believe that it is a solid charity.
